forward_facing: toward the creatures pulling the vehicle
acceleration: the speed of the pulling creature(s)
propulsion: Muscle (pulled; 2 Medium creatures or 1 Large creature)
driving_space: the most forward square of the chariot
maximum_speed: twice the speed of the pulling creature(s)
name: Chariot, Light
driving_check: Handle Animal or Profession (driver) (in the case of creatures with animal intelligence pulling the vehicle), Diplomacy or Intimidate (in the case of intelligent creatures pulling the vehicle)
